kashmir.name: Kashmir Paradise Tour
kashmir.description: Experience the beauty of the valleys and lakes of Kashmir.
kashmir.detailedDescription: Explore the mesmerizing beauty of Kashmir with a visit to its famous valleys, lakes, and gardens.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, transfer to Houseboat.
Day 2: Explore Dal Lake by Shikara, Mughal Gardens visit.
Day 3: Visit Pahalgam and Betaab Valley.
Day 4: Explore Gulmarg and return to Srinagar.

kashmir.name: Kashmir Adventure Trek
kashmir.description: Enjoy thrilling treks in the stunning landscapes of Kashmir.
kashmir.detailedDescription: Embark on a trekking adventure in the lush green meadows and snow-capped mountains of Kashmir.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Srinagar and transfer to Pahalgam.
Day 2: Start the trek to Lidderwat Valley.
Day 3: Trek to Tarsar Lake and enjoy the stunning views.
Day 4: Return to Srinagar.

kashmir.name: Romantic Kashmir Getaway
kashmir.description: Perfect for couples looking for a scenic retreat.
kashmir.detailedDescription: A romantic journey through Kashmir’s most beautiful landscapes, perfect for couples seeking peace and serenity.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Srinagar, transfer to houseboat.
Day 2: Shikara ride on Dal Lake, visit Mughal Gardens.
Day 3: Day trip to Sonamarg, explore the meadows.
Day 4: Return to Srinagar for departure.

kashmir.name: Winter Wonderland
kashmir.description: Explore Kashmir in winter with snow-covered beauty.
kashmir.detailedDescription: Discover the charm of Kashmir in the winter months, when it is covered in pristine snow and offers winter sports like skiing.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar and check-in at a hotel.
Day 2: Visit Gulmarg for skiing and snow activities.
Day 3: Explore Pahalgam and the snow-covered landscapes.
Day 4: Departure from Srinagar.

kashmir.name: Kashmir Cultural Tour
kashmir.description: Discover the rich traditions and culture of Kashmir.
kashmir.detailedDescription: A cultural tour through Kashmir to experience its vibrant history, traditional art, and craftsmanship.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, visit Shankaracharya Temple.
Day 2: Explore Mughal Gardens, visit local handicraft markets.
Day 3: Visit the famous Hazratbal Shrine and explore Srinagar.
Day 4: Depart from Srinagar.

jammu.name: Vaishno Devi Yatra
jammu.description: A spiritual journey to the sacred shrine of Vaishno Devi.
jammu.detailedDescription: A spiritually enriching pilgrimage to the Vaishno Devi Temple located on the Trikuta Mountains.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Katra, start the trek to Vaishno Devi.
Day 2: Visit the Vaishno Devi Temple.
Day 3: Return from Katra.

jammu.name: Jammu Heritage Tour
jammu.description: Explore the historical and cultural landmarks of Jammu.
jammu.detailedDescription: An in-depth tour of Jammu’s ancient temples, forts, and historical monuments.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Jammu, visit the Raghunath Temple.
Day 2: Explore the Mubarak Mandi Palace and Bahu Fort.
Day 3: Depart from Jammu.

jammu.name: Adventure in Patnitop
jammu.description: Thrilling adventures in the scenic hills of Patnitop.
jammu.detailedDescription: Engage in various adventure activities like trekking, paragliding, and skiing in the hills of Patnitop.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Patnitop, check-in at a hotel.
Day 2: Paragliding and trekking in the hills.
Day 3: Skiing (seasonal).
Day 4: Return to Jammu.

jammu.name: Jammu Wildlife Safari
jammu.description: Discover the wildlife and natural beauty of Jammu.
jammu.detailedDescription: A safari through Jammu’s rich wildlife reserves, perfect for nature lovers and photographers.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Jammu and transfer to the wildlife reserve.
Day 2: Full-day safari and nature walk.
Day 3: Return to Jammu.

jammu.name: Jammu Food and Culture Tour
jammu.description: Experience the flavors and traditions of Jammu.
jammu.detailedDescription: A tour focused on the rich food culture of Jammu, including visits to local markets and restaurants.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Jammu, visit local food markets.
Day 2: Taste local delicacies and explore cultural landmarks.
Day 3: Departure.

ladakh.name: Ladakh Adventure Expedition
ladakh.description: An adrenaline-filled trip through the mountains of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Embark on an adventurous journey through Ladakh’s rugged terrain. Experience thrilling activities like trekking, mountain biking, and exploring remote regions.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Leh, transfer to hotel.
Day 2: Explore Pangong Lake, experience the landscapes.
Day 3: Trek through Nubra Valley.
Day 4: Return to Leh, sightseeing in Leh Market and Leh Palace.

ladakh.name: Ladakh Motorcycle Tour
ladakh.description: A thrilling ride through the rugged terrains of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Join a motorcycle tour through Ladakh’s stunning and challenging roads. Feel the thrill as you ride through high-altitude passes and explore mesmerizing landscapes.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Leh, meet the group and briefing.
Day 2: Ride to Pangong Lake.
Day 3: Ride to Nubra Valley, visit Diskit Monastery.
Day 4: Return to Leh via Khardung La.

ladakh.name: Leh-Ladakh Cultural Tour
ladakh.description: Immerse yourself in the rich heritage and traditions of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: This cultural tour offers an opportunity to explore the traditions, history, and art of Ladakh. Visit ancient monasteries, palaces, and experience local culture.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Leh, visit Shanti Stupa.
Day 2: Explore Hemis Monastery and Thiksey Monastery.
Day 3: Visit Leh Palace and Leh Market.
Day 4: Visit Stok Palace and depart from Leh.

ladakh.name: Frozen River Trek
ladakh.description: Walk over the frozen Zanskar River on this unforgettable trek.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Trek over the frozen Zanskar River, one of the most unique and thrilling experiences in Ladakh. The trek takes you through stunning icy landscapes and remote villages.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Leh, acclimatization.
Day 2: Transfer to Chilling and start the trek.
Day 3: Trek through the frozen river to Lingshed.
Day 4: Return trek and drive back to Leh.

ladakh.name: Ladakh Scenic Retreat
ladakh.description: Enjoy a peaceful retreat in the breathtaking landscapes of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: A serene retreat in the heart of Ladakh, this tour offers you a chance to unwind amidst breathtaking mountain views, lakes, and peaceful monasteries.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Leh, relax and enjoy the serene surroundings.
Day 2: Visit Pangong Lake and relax by the lakeside.
Day 3: Explore the Nubra Valley and relax in its serene landscapes.
Day 4: Return to Leh for departure.
